activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11079
activity.text:
@rithviknishad, I would like to work on this.

## Implementation Steps

- **Check Existing Breadcrumbs** – Review the breadcrumb logic in the Locations view and reuse the same pattern.  
- **Fetch Organization Hierarchy** – Modify the query to fetch the organization's hierarchy.  
- **Generate & Render Breadcrumbs** – Implement a function similar to `generateBreadcrumbs` for organizations and render it in the UI.  

**ETA:** By tomorrow EOD.
